text: Era emu ku zo bw’eneefanga n’egwa ku kintu eky’engeri yonna ekikozesebwa, ekintu ekyo kinaafuukanga ekitali kirongoofu, obanga ekintu ekyo kyakolebwa mu muti, oba mu lugoye, oba mu ddiba oba mu kkutiya. Kiteekebwenga mu mazzi. Tekiibenga kirongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi; kyokka oluvannyuma kinaalongookanga.
